short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to inspect network requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Network Inspector is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you monitor, analyze, and debug network requests in real-time. Whether you are a web developer, designer, or tech enthusiast, Network Inspector provides the insights you need to understand how web pages load and interact with servers.
